attributes.action: Stop the demolition of Moneyglass Motocross Track in Northern Ireland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Moneyglass MX Track was purpose built for the 2007 MX GP of Ireland. demolition of this track is a big loss to Irish Motocross. This track could relieve pressue on other motocross tracks in NI from over use hence saving all the tracks.With planning permission granted it would be used by the MRA(Ireland) and possibly the MCCNI (YMSA)local MX organisations. It could also possibly stage National and World events again drawing in Huge crowds of supporters and boosting the local economy.  HELP SAVE MONEYGLASS MX TRACK!!!!
